import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { X } from 'lucide-react'; const Settings = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ theme: 'dark', fontSize: 'medium', notifications: true, language: 'en', autoSave: true }); const handleSave = () => { localStorage.setItem('policypal_settings', JSON.stringify(settings)); onClose(); }; if (!isOpen) return null; return (

Settings

); }; export default Settings;
